New Records: Shaheen Shah Afridi became the fastest to 100 ODI wickets for quick bowlers.
Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi dismissed Tanzid Hasan in the first over to reach 100 wickets.
Fakhar Zaman scored 81 off 74 balls, setting up Pakistan's win.
Shaheen Afridi took 3 wickets for 23 runs.
Mohammad Wasim took 3 wickets for 31 runs.
Mehidy Hasan Miraz took 3 wickets for 60 runs.
Fakhar Zaman and Abdullah Shafique put up a 128-run partnership for the first wicket.
Haris Rauf dismissed Mushfiqur Rahim after being hit for three boundaries.
Iftikhar Ahmed dismissed Litton Das with a soft delivery.
Mohammad Wasim cleaned up the tail, dismissing Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Taskin Ahmed, and Mustafizur Rahman.
Post-Match Reflections: The win lifted Pakistan to No. 5 on the points table, keeping their semi-final hopes alive.
Fakhar Zaman expressed confidence in his ability to hit sixes anywhere on the pitch.
The win ended Pakistan's longest World Cup losing run.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan won by 7 wickets with 105 balls remaining.
Bangladesh was officially knocked out of the tournament.
The match was held at Eden Gardens on October 31, 2023.
